title: Beautiful Mess
description: Warning: contains pet rats, hot YouTube celebrity roommates, and one spurned girlfriend about to get even...Working in a wedding cake shop sucks when you've just been dumped.Bailey Frost has a recipe for disaster: one cheating ex, one big glass of liquor, and three well-meaning male friends who think her lack of a sex life is funny. Before she knows it, she's confessed that she's never had an orgasm with a man.Now Bailey has to navigate sappy couples at work, while her friends are hell-bent on helping her get revenge on evil Craig...by dressing up as werewolves, on YouTube.And one of those friends - the tall, shy-but-gorgeous Linc - might just want to help Bailey with that other little problem...
author: Lucy V. Morgan
